subject: Re: New member- and help with Macs?
msgSnippet: I have close to zero programming experience, so I don t really know how to make the fonts appear in either Safari or Internet Explorer. I tried changing the
messageBody:
I have close to zero programming experience, so I don't really know how to make the
fonts appear in either Safari or Internet Explorer. I tried changing the font Preferences
in Safari to one the Kingsley, and ended up with all of my Microsoft Outlook inbox
written in that font--but nothing that was supposed to be written in that font
appearing correct.

How should I go about mixing both Roman for where Roman is written on the internet
with one of the Shavian/Quikscript fonts? As an aside, when I tried to download the
one through Yahoo, it never got past the "initiating download stage", though I will try
again later today.

Thanks for your help.
